name.livitski.tools.xml.staxform

Class XMLEventTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.transform.Transformer
      • name.livitski.tools.xml.staxform.AbstractTransformer
        • name.livitski.tools.xml.staxform.XMLEventTransformer

  • public class XMLEventTransformer
extends AbstractTransformer
    Implements basic functions of a Transformer by delegating to a user-defined XMLEventProcessor. If no event processor is supplied, performs the "identity transformation" making a copy of the Source to the Result.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  XMLEventTransformer.XMLHeaderProcessor
      Changes or removes the transformed document's header in accordance with the transformer's output properties.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class name.livitski.tools.xml.staxform.AbstractTransformer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLEventTransformer()
      Creates an XMLEventTransformer that delegates to an IdentityEventProcessor to perform "identity transformation" of the XML stream.
      XMLEventTransformer(XMLEventProcessor function)
      Creates an XMLEventTransformer using a custom event transformation function.

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public void transform(Source xmlSource,
             Result outputTarget)
               throws TransformerException
        Performs identity transformation. TODO: take into account the output parameters when transforming NOTE: its the caller's responsibility to set up encoding of the Result argument if it writes to a byte stream. The encoding should match the OutputKeys.ENCODING output property. NOTE: its the caller's responsibility to close the underlying streams.
        Specified by:
        transform in class Transformer
        Throws:
        TransformerException

      • setFunction

        public void setFunction(XMLEventProcessor function)
        Changes the event transformation function used by this XMLEventTransformer.
        Parameters:
        function - the transformation function or null to use an IdentityEventProcessor for transformation

      • preprocessor

        protected XMLEventProcessor preprocessor()
        Override to implement pre-processing of enevts before they are fed to the user-defined processor. Default implementation returns an XMLEventTransformer.XMLHeaderProcessor.
        Returns:
        pre-processor for events or null to skip event pre-processing

      • postprocessor

        protected XMLEventProcessor postprocessor()
        Override to implement post-processing of enevts received from the user-defined processor. Default implementation returns null.
        Returns:
        post-processor for events or null to skip the post-processing
